name: Waiter Of The Sumo
description:
We reccomend playing the windows build for the best experience, but if you don't like downloading games you can try the WebGL build.

Game

Play as a drunk waiter trying to not get fired from a restaurant full of impatient sumo wrestlers.

Featuring: Totally realistic Ragdoll-based drunk person simulations (Very real!), Wide range of emotions (Anger, is chaos an emotion?), Complex crafting (4 Recipes!), Fire, Extinguishers

The Team

IQuick 143 - Prodigy of the Ragdoll, Programming Master, Visionary?, 3D modeller, 3 Steps ahead

27chandler - Greater Programmer, Maser

Wadoren - Senior Programmer, 3D modeller, Post Processing Slave

xriva - 3D Modelling lead, 3D Animation, Sceptic of the Ragdoll, Post Processing Master

(idk what order Master, Greater and Senior ranks are)

Assets

We made all graphic art by ourselves and used pre-made audio assets.

Music:

Brandenburg Concerto No. 4 in G, Movement I (Allegro), BWV 1049 Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
